about.title: One platform for all of Libya
about.description: Labas connects patients, doctors, and hospitals across Libya through a secure and intuitive digital experience.
about.paragraph1: We deliver smart tools for booking appointments, tracking medical results, and chatting with healthcare providers, while empowering clinics and hospitals with powerful scheduling and operations dashboards.
about.vision: Our vision is a unified digital health network that improves care for people and boosts efficiency for medical teams in every city.

map.title: Nationwide coverage across key cities
map.subtitle: Hover or tap a city to explore connected hospitals and clinics.
map.empty: Select a city to view available medical partners.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions and help you get started.

footer.location: Belaoun - Health Institute Street, Benghazi - Libya
footer.copyright: © 2025 Egate Company For Information Technology. All rights reserved.

faq.title: Everything you need to know
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about how to use Labas and its services.

appointments.question: How do I book a medical appointment?
appointments.answer: Open the app, choose the medical facility or doctor that suits you, then select the time and date that works best. You'll receive instant confirmation through the app and can easily manage your appointments.

security.question: Is my health data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use advanced medical-grade encryption to protect all your health information. Your data belongs to you alone and is never shared with any party without your explicit consent.

records.question: Can I access my test results and medical reports?
records.answer: Absolutely! All your test results and medical reports are available in your unified health record within the app. You can view them anytime and share them with your doctor when needed.

support.question: How do I contact the support team?
support.answer: You can reach us via email at support{'@'}labas.ly or call us at +218 91-057 9911. Our team is available to help with any inquiries.

organizations.question: Can clinics and hospitals use Labas?
organizations.answer: Yes! We provide a comprehensive dashboard for medical institutions to manage appointments, smart scheduling, and unified calendar views. Contact us to learn more about our solutions for organizations.

cost.question: Is the app free?
cost.answer: Yes, the Labas app is free to download and use. You can book appointments and access our core services at no cost. Some advanced services may require a subscription depending on the medical institution.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy applies to all users within the State of Libya. By using the 'LABAS' application, you agree to the terms set forth in this policy, which aims to protect your privacy, the security of your personal information, and ensure transparency in how we handle your data.
privacy.ownership: The LABAS application is owned, fully managed, and supported by Egate Company For Information Technology, which is responsible for processing and protecting your personal information as described in this policy.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: The 'LABAS' application collects information you provide during your use of the application, including:

location.title: Location Data:
location.description: We may collect and use your device's geolocation data to identify the nearest healthcare providers to you. This is done after obtaining your permission to use location services on your device.

payment.title: Payment Information:
payment.description: When charging the 'LABAS' wallet, you must enter the necessary payment information, such as information related to electronic payment cards used in accordance with the available and approved payment systems in Libya.

documents.title: Document Images:
documents.description: Images of medical prescriptions and medical test requests that you submit through the application are collected to facilitate the provision of the required services.

other.title: Other Data:
other.description: Information collected through your inquiries, complaints, or comments when communicating with customer service.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services and ensure a safe and seamless user experience. Uses include:

uses.services: Providing services: Processing your requests, such as booking medical appointments, ordering medications, or requesting tests.
uses.communication: Communicating with you: Sending notifications or updates related to your account or requests, responding to your inquiries or complaints through the call center.
uses.improvement: Improving services: Analyzing data to develop the application and add new features that meet user needs.
uses.marketing: Marketing: Sending promotional offers, discounts, or information about our services, with the option to unsubscribe at any time.

section3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
section3.intro: With Third Parties: Your personal information is shared only in the following cases:

parties.providers: Service providers: We only share this information with your consent when you make a booking of an appointment with the service provider if they need it.
parties.suppliers: Suppliers: to ensure the provision of services as required.
parties.government: Government authorities: if we are legally required to share the information pursuant to court orders or applicable laws.

confidentiality.title: Ensuring Confidentiality:
confidentiality.standards: We require the third parties we deal with to follow the same data protection standards that we apply.
confidentiality.noSale: We will not sell or rent your personal information to any third party under any circumstances.

section4.title: 4. Information Security
section4.intro: We are committed to taking appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or damage. These measures include:

measures.encryption: Encrypting data during transmission and storage.

section4.disclaimer: However, the security of information cannot be guaranteed completely due to the nature of the internet. Therefore, we advise you to protect your account information and not share it with others.
section4.management: Egate Company For Information Technology manages and implements all technical and organizational measures to protect your data on the LABAS application.

access.title: Access to Information
access.description: You have the right to request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.

modify.title: Modifying Information
modify.description: You can modify your personal data or correct errors in it through your account settings.

delete.title: Deleting Information
delete.description: You can request the deletion of your personal information from our records or cancel your account. However, we may retain some data for a specific period if required by law.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribing
unsubscribe.description: As a user, you have the right to stop receiving any marketing messages from the application at any time. Unsubscribing from marketing messages will not affect the receipt of important notifications related to your account or the services you have requested.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section6.description: The 'LABAS' application reserves the right to modify or update the Privacy Policy at any time. Users will be notified of any material changes through in-app notifications or by sending them via email to registered accounts. These amendments shall be effective 7 days from the date of notification.

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.description: Your personal data is retained only as long as it is necessary to provide services or to comply with legal obligations. Upon the expiration of the purpose of data collection or upon your request, we delete the data or anonymize it securely.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy Policy
section8.description: The 'LABAS' application is not designed for use by children under the age of 18 without parental supervision. If we discover that we have collected information about a child without parental consent, we will delete it immediately.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.intro: If you have any questions or complaints regarding the Privacy Policy, you can contact us via:

contact.app: Through the application via the 'Contact Us' feature.

section10.title: 10. Applicable Laws
section10.description: This policy is subject to the provisions of data protection legislation in Libya. In case of any dispute regarding this policy, the Libyan courts shall have jurisdiction.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.ownership: Ownership and Management: The LABAS application is owned, fully managed, and supported by Egate Company For Information Technology.

section1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
section1.description: By using our App, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree, do not use the App.

section2.title: 2. Information Submission
section2.description: Users must provide accurate and truthful information during registration and use of the application. Users bear full legal responsibility for the accuracy of the data they provide, including health or personal data sent through the application.

section3.title: 3. Responsibility for Medical Information
section3.description: Users are solely responsible for the accuracy and validity of health information, medical prescription images, or laboratory reports submitted through the application. The application bears no responsibility for any consequences resulting from submitting incorrect or inaccurate information.

section4.title: 4. Role of the Application
section4.description: The application acts as a appointment booking system between patients and healthcare providers to facilitate healthcare services. It is not responsible for medical errors, service quality, or legal claims related to services provided by third parties.

section5.title: 5. Legal Use
section5.description: Using the application for illegal or harmful purposes is prohibited. Misuse that causes annoyance or damage to others, the application, or service providers is also prohibited. Accounts may be suspended or terminated for violations.

section6.title: 6. Information Guarantee
section6.description: The application strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information. However, healthcare providers are responsible for the accuracy of details like appointments, service prices, and availability.

section7.title: 7. Cancellation and Refund Policy
section7.description: Users may cancel confirmed reservations and request refunds within 24 hours by contacting the 'LABAS' call center. Service providers may have special policies regarding refunds, and users should review them before confirming reservations.

section8.title: 8. Payments
section8.description: Users are responsible for paying fees upon reservation confirmation. Payments are processed through approved electronic systems in Libya. The application is not responsible for payment errors caused by the user or payment service providers.

section9.title: 9. Intellectual Property Rights
section9.description: All intellectual property rights related to the application, including designs, logos, texts, and software, are the exclusive property of 'LABAS,' owned by Egate Company For Information Technology. Unauthorized copying, modification, or reproduction is prohibited.

section10.title: 10. Security and Privacy
section10.description: The application is committed to protecting user data in accordance with the Privacy Policy. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account data.

section11.title: 11. Service Termination
section11.description: The application may terminate or suspend user accounts for violating terms, providing false data, or misusing services.

section12.title: 12. Limitation of Liability
section12.description: The application is not liable for direct or indirect damages arising from its use. Disputes between users and service providers must be resolved directly between them.

section13.title: 13. Customer Service
section13.description: The LABAS application is managed and supported by Egate Company For Information Technology. For any assistance, please contact our customer service team.

section14.title: 14. Governing Law
section14.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of Libya. Libyan courts have jurisdiction over any disputes.

section15.title: 15. Language Use
section15.description: The terms and conditions are available in both Arabic and English. However, the Arabic version is the official and legally binding version.
section15.note: In case of any conflict or difference in interpretation between the two versions, the Arabic version shall prevail.

section16.title: 16. Urgent Communication
section16.description: In emergencies, users can contact the 'LABAS' support team through the following channels:

section17.title: 17. Notification of Amendments
section17.description: The application reserves the right to modify these Terms. Users will be notified of material changes at least 7 days before they take effect. Continued use of the application constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

section18.title: 18. Account Creation and Use
section18.description: Users may create only one account and must maintain confidentiality of login credentials. Sharing the account with others is prohibited, and the user bears full responsibility for any unauthorized use of their account.

section19.title: 19. User Obligations
section19.obligation1: The user undertakes not to upload any illegal, abusive, or content that violates local or international laws.
section19.obligation2: The user undertakes to use the application for personal purposes only, and not to use it for any commercial purposes without prior permission.

section20.title: 20. Data Retention
section20.description1: The application retains user data only as long as necessary to provide services or as required by law.
section20.description2: The user can request to delete their data in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

section21.title: 21. Advertising Policy
section21.description1: The application may contain third-party advertisements.
section21.description2: The application is not responsible for the content of advertisements or any transactions that occur between the user and advertisers.

section22.title: 22. Reporting Violations
section22.description: In case of observing any violations or inappropriate content within the application, the user can report it through the reporting feature within the application or through the call center.

hero.title: Your personal healthcare assistant
hero.subtitle: Schedule appointments, request services, and manage your health anywhere in Libya.

introduction.title: One app for every healthcare request
introduction.description: The LABAS mobile application centralizes bookings, prescriptions, diagnostics, and urgent support so individuals and families can manage health from anywhere.
bullets: Book doctors, hospitals, and specialist groups without phone calls.
Request prescription delivery, diagnostics, or home healthcare to your door.
Top up your eWallet, manage transactions, and add relatives in seconds.
Reach customer services 24/7 for ambulance requests or guided bookings.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Follow these quick steps to activate the LABAS experience on your device.
steps: Download the LABAS app from the App Store or Google Play.
Sign up or log in using your mobile number.
Complete your profile for personalized recommendations.
Enter the one-time password (OTP) sent to your device to verify your account.

menus.title: App Menus Overview
menus.description: Navigate every service through four primary tabs that live at the bottom of the app.

home.title: Home
home.description: Main page where you can access services such as Doctors, Hospitals, Pharmacy, Labs, Home Visits, Services, Ambulance, and 24/7 Help.

bookings.title: Bookings
bookings.description: View and manage all current and past healthcare bookings (appointments, home visits, lab tests, etc.).

orders.title: Orders
orders.description: Track and manage all pharmacy and service orders.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.description: View your balance, add funds, review transactions, and manage payment methods.

home.title: Home Screen Overview
home.description: Once logged in, the dashboard displays clearly labelled categories for easy navigation:

hospitals.title: Hospitals
hospitals.description: Find and book services at nearby hospitals

labs.title: Labs
labs.description: Schedule lab tests and request sample collection

homeVisits.title: Home Visits
homeVisits.description: Book home visits by healthcare professionals

features.title: Everything you can do inside the app
features.subtitle: Each feature mirrors the official LABAS guides so people know exactly what to expect.

appointment.title: Make an Appointment
appointment.description: Schedule appointments with doctors and specialists using the eWallet for secure payments.
steps: Tap "Doctors" on the home screen.
Choose the specialization that fits your need.
Select a doctor or available group.
Pick the preferred date and time slot.
Apply filters (city, specialty, gender) if needed.
Confirm the booking and receive instant confirmation.

hospitals.title: Hospitals
hospitals.description: Search nearby public or private hospitals and reserve the right service.
steps: Tap "Hospitals".
Use filters to narrow by city or sector.
Select a hospital from the list.
Choose the required doctor or service.
Confirm and share any notes if needed.

prescription.title: Request Prescription
prescription.description: Upload prescriptions or product images and get medications delivered.
steps: Tap "Pharmacy".
Upload a clear prescription or medicine image.
Add comments or instructions if needed.
Submit and wait for the pharmacist confirmation.

labServices.title: Lab Services and Radiology
labServices.description: Book lab tests, CT scans, or radiology services with on-site or home collection.
steps: Tap "Labs".
Choose "Laboratory" for tests or "CT" for radiology.
Enter the required details and attach documents.
Submit the request and track status from the app.

homeVisit.title: Home Visit
homeVisit.description: Schedule medical visits, nursing services, or home care at your address.
steps: Tap "Home Visit".
Pick the organization that will deliver the service.
Provide address details and attach supporting files.
Confirm and monitor the visit from the Bookings tab.

services.title: Services
services.description: Access physiotherapy, radiology, pediatrics, and seasonal care packages.
steps: Tap "Services".
Filter by city to view local providers.
Select a category (e.g., Echo, Circumcision).
Pick the exact service, choose a time, and confirm.

ambulance.title: Request Ambulance
ambulance.description: Reach the LABAS call center for emergency transportation 24/7.
steps: Tap "Ambulance" or call through the 24/7 Help button.
Share your live location or describe the pickup address.
Add critical details (patient status, access instructions).
Submit and stay on the line for live support.

bookings.title: Bookings Tab
bookings.description: The bookings tab centralizes every appointment or request.
bookings.viewManage: View and manage all current and past healthcare bookings (appointments, home visits, lab tests, etc.).
bookings.addRelative: Add relatives by entering their full name, relation, date of birth, gender, and blood group to book on their behalf.

orders.title: Orders Tab
orders.description: Track pharmacy purchases and service requests in real time.
orders.trackManage: Track and manage all pharmacy and service orders.
orders.addRelative: Add a relative to place orders for them with the same quick form used in bookings.

wallet.title: Wallet Tab
wallet.description: Control payments and see every transaction in one view.
wallet.viewBalance: View your current balance and transaction history.
wallet.addFunds: Add funds instantly through supported payment methods.
wallet.managePayment: Manage payment methods for faster checkout.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.description: Use the "My Profile" area to keep your account secure and up to date.
items: Update the registered phone number (OTP required).
Change your password and language preference.
Log out securely or delete the account permanently.

support.title: Contact Support
support.description: Get assistance 24/7 through the channels below or directly inside the app.

hero.title: Your personal healthcare assistant in your pocket
hero.subtitle: Book doctor appointments, request prescription delivery, schedule lab tests, and access essential medical services.

appointments.title: Make an Appointment
appointments.description: Choose a specialization, select a doctor, and book your preferred time in seconds.

hospitals.title: Hospitals
hospitals.description: Browse and book services from nearby hospitals. Filter by city or sector.

prescription.title: Request Prescription
prescription.description: Upload a clear prescription image. A pharmacist will review and confirm your order.

labServices.title: Lab Services and Radiology
labServices.description: Book lab tests or radiology. Samples collected from your location. Results delivered as PDF.

homeVisit.title: Home Visit
homeVisit.description: Request at-home healthcare services. Select an organization and enter your address.

services.title: Services
services.description: Access physiotherapy, radiology, and more. Filter by city and category.

ambulance.title: Request Ambulance
ambulance.description: Enter your location and submit. An ambulance will be dispatched immediately.

support247.title: 24/7 Help
support247.description: Get continuous support and help whenever you need it. Live chat available.

healthRecords.title: Health Records
healthRecords.description: Access all your medical records, prescriptions, and test results in one place.

download.title: Download the App
download.description: Download from App Store or Google Play. Register using your mobile number.

chooseService.title: Choose a Service
chooseService.description: Access Doctors, Hospitals, Pharmacy, Labs, Home Visits, Services, Ambulance, and 24/7 Help.

getCareFast.title: Get Care Fast
getCareFast.description: View and manage bookings, track orders, manage your wallet, and access all services instantly.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your health data is encrypted and protected. Privacy is our priority.

allInOne.title: All-in-One Health Hub
allInOne.description: Doctors, hospitals, pharmacy, labs, home visits, services, and ambulance. Everything in one app.

instant.title: Instant Access
instant.description: Book appointments, request services, and access your health records in seconds.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Email: support{'@'}labas.ly | Phone: +218 91-4285424 | Live Chat available 24/7.

hero.title: LABAS Medical Institutions Dashboard
hero.subtitle: A user-friendly platform designed to streamline daily healthcare operations. Manage appointments, bookings, doctor profiles, imaging services, and timetables all in one place.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage all your appointments and schedules

overview.title: Dashboard Overview
overview.subtitle: Once logged in, you will see the main sections designed to help you manage your healthcare operations efficiently.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of key tasks, statistics, and upcoming appointments.

newAppointment.title: New Appointment
newAppointment.description: Create new appointments with full patient and booking details.

appointmentCalendar.title: Appointment Calendar
appointmentCalendar.description: A calendar view of all scheduled appointments with filtering and editing options.

bookings.title: Bookings
bookings.description: Manage incoming booking requests (approve, reschedule, or cancel).

bookingInfo.title: Booking Information
bookingInfo.description: Contains three major components: Doctor Profile, Group (Team), and Imaging Services.

schedules.title: All Schedules — Timetable
schedules.description: Manage the schedules of doctors, groups, and imaging services.

navigation.title: Explore Dashboard Features
navigation.subtitle: Click on any feature below to learn more about managing appointments, booking information, and schedules

appointments.title: Appointments & Bookings
appointments.description: Learn how to create appointments, manage your calendar, and handle booking requests

bookingInfo.title: Booking Information
bookingInfo.description: Manage doctor profiles, groups, and imaging services

schedules.title: Schedules & Timetables
schedules.description: Set up and manage schedules for doctors, groups, and services

onboarding.title: Getting Started
onboarding.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start using the LABAS Dashboard

login.title: Login & Access
login.description: Visit https://org.labas.ly/login, enter your username and password, then click Login to access your dashboard. If you face login issues, contact the support team.

explore.title: Explore the Dashboard
explore.description: Once logged in, familiarize yourself with the main sections: Dashboard overview, New Appointment, Appointment Calendar, Bookings, Booking Information, and Schedules.

setup.title: Set Up Your Information
setup.description: Start by adding doctor profiles, creating groups (teams), and setting up imaging services. Make sure all information is provided in both Arabic and English where required.

start.title: Start Managing
start.description: Begin creating appointments, managing bookings, and setting up schedules. The dashboard provides all the tools you need to streamline your daily operations.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your healthcare operations?
cta.subtitle: Access the LABAS Dashboard and start managing your appointments, bookings, and schedules today.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about using the LABAS Dashboard

login.question: How do I log in?
login.answer: Visit the login page at https://org.labas.ly/login, enter your credentials, and click Login.

password.question: I forgot my password — what should I do?
password.answer: Contact the LABAS support team for password reset assistance.

createAppointment.question: How do I create a new appointment?
createAppointment.answer: Go to New Appointment, fill in all details including patient type, patient information, booking type, and booking details, then save.

calendar.question: Can I view appointments in a calendar?
calendar.answer: Yes — the appointment calendar provides filtering and editing tools. You can filter by booking type or date range and click any appointment to view or edit details.

notAppearing.question: Why isn't my doctor/group/service appearing in the app?
notAppearing.answer: Check that the record is Active and it has been approved by the Super Admin, if required.

saveAppointment.question: What should I do if an appointment is not saving?
saveAppointment.answer: Ensure all fields are filled logically and correctly. Check that patient information, booking type, and booking details are all complete before clicking Save.

hero.title: Appointments & Bookings Management
hero.subtitle: Streamline your appointment scheduling and booking management

newAppointment.title: Create New Appointments
newAppointment.subtitle: Easily create appointments with full patient and booking details

click.title: Click New Appointment
click.description: Navigate to the New Appointment section from the main dashboard.

select.title: Select Patient Type
select.description: Choose the appropriate patient type for the appointment.

enter.title: Enter Patient Information
enter.description: Fill in all required patient details accurately.

choose.title: Choose Booking Type
choose.description: Select the type of booking that matches the appointment needs.

fill.title: Fill in Booking Details
fill.description: Complete all booking-specific information and requirements.

save.title: Click Save
save.description: Review all information and save the appointment to the system.

calendar.title: Appointment Calendar
calendar.subtitle: View and manage all your appointments in a clean calendar layout

view.title: View All Appointments
view.description: See all scheduled appointments in a clean calendar layout for easy overview.

filter.title: Filter by Type or Date
filter.description: Filter appointments by booking type or date range to find what you need quickly.

edit.title: View and Edit Details
edit.description: Click any appointment to view or edit its details directly from the calendar.

bookings.title: Manage Booking Requests
bookings.subtitle: Full management of incoming patient booking requests

view.title: View All Bookings
view.description: See all incoming patient bookings in one organized view.

approve.title: Approve Requests
approve.description: Approve booking requests that meet your criteria and availability.

reschedule.title: Reschedule Appointments
reschedule.description: Easily reschedule appointments to different times or dates when needed.

cancel.title: Cancel Requests
cancel.description: Cancel booking requests that cannot be accommodated.

filter.title: Filter by Criteria
filter.description: Filter bookings by customer name, date, or status to find specific requests quickly.

dashboardBookingInfo.heroSubtitle: Manage doctor profiles, groups, and imaging services to streamline your healthcare operations
dashboardBookingInfo.title: Booking Information
dashboardBookingInfo.subtitle: A detailed module containing key operational tools for managing your healthcare services

doctorProfile.title: Doctor Profile
doctorProfile.description: Manage doctor profiles with specialization, degree, and consulting price information.
doctorProfile.step2: Select the doctor from the database (if available)
doctorProfile.step5: Enter consulting price (0 for public doctors)
doctorProfile.note: The doctor profile will not appear in the app until the Super Admin approves the price.

group.title: Group (Team)
group.description: A group of doctors assigned to a specific day, helping patients book by availability rather than individual doctors.
group.note: The group information must be provided in both Arabic and English.

imaging.title: Imaging Services
imaging.description: Patients request imaging services; the institution confirms and the call center delivers results through the app.

dashboardSchedules.heroSubtitle: Manage doctor and service availability with comprehensive scheduling tools
dashboardSchedules.title: All Schedules — Timetable
dashboardSchedules.subtitle: Manage doctor and service availability with comprehensive scheduling tools

view.title: View Full Schedules
view.description: View full schedules, shifts, and availability for doctors, groups, and imaging services.

edit.title: Edit Schedules
edit.description: Edit schedules based on doctor or group availability to optimize your operations.

editing.title: Editing a Timetable
editing.step1: The Schedulable Type section (Doctor / Group / Imaging) appears automatically — do not modify it.
editing.step3: Ensure the timetable is set to Active.
editing.step4: Click Save to apply your changes.

bookingWindow.title: Booking Window
bookingWindow.description: How far in advance booking is allowed
